description: Comprehensive API documentation for Rentwiz Property Management System
authentication: JWT Bearer Token (configured; many endpoints currently marked [AllowAnonymous] for development)

register.description: Owner registration endpoint - Note: Files (profile pictures, documents) are now uploaded separately via the File Upload API after registration

response_body_error.message: Failed to register owner | Validation errors | Mobile number already exists
errors: Mobile number must be between 10 and 15 digits

response_body_error.message: Invalid login id or password | Role is required | Unsupported role

create_owner.description: Create a new owner - Note: Files (profile pictures, documents) are uploaded separately via File Upload API

response_body_error.message: Validation failed | LoginId is already in use | Mobile number already exists | Failed to create address
errors: Mobile number must be between 10 and 15 digits
string array of other validation errors

create_property.description: Create a new property - Note: Property images are uploaded separately via File Upload API

get_properties_by_owner.description: Get all properties for a specific owner

get_property_owner_contact.description: Get owner contact details for a property

response_body_success.message: Property owner contact information retrieved successfully

create_tenant.description: Create a new tenant - Note: Tenant files (profile pictures, documents) are uploaded separately via File Upload API

get_tenants_by_property.description: Get all tenants for a specific property

get_tenants_by_owner.description: Get all tenants for a specific owner

get_tenants_by_room.description: Get all tenants for a specific room

search_tenants.description: Search tenants with filters and pagination

create_room.description: Create a new room - Note: Room images are uploaded separately via File Upload API

get_rooms_by_property.description: Get all rooms for a specific property

get_rooms_by_owner.description: Get all rooms for a specific owner

search_rooms_by_property.description: Get rooms by property with pagination

search_rooms_by_owner.description: Get rooms by owner with pagination

create_rent_track.description: Create a new rent track record

get_rent_track_by_id.description: Get rent track by ID - Returns enhanced RentTrackResponseDto with property name, tenant name, and room number

get_rent_tracks_by_property.description: Get all rent tracks for a specific property - Returns enhanced RentTrackResponseDto with property name, tenant name, and room number

get_rent_tracks_by_tenant.description: Get all rent tracks for a specific tenant - Returns enhanced RentTrackResponseDto with property name, tenant name, and room number

get_rent_tracks_by_owner.description: Get all rent tracks for a specific owner - Returns enhanced RentTrackResponseDto with property name, tenant name, and room number

search_rent_tracks.description: Search rent tracks with filters (paginated) - Enhanced with property name, tenant name, and room number search and display

request_body.searchTerm: string (optional - searches across note, rent values, property name, tenant name, and room number)
request_body.sortBy: string (optional - supports: rentPeriodStartDate, rentPeriodEndDate, expectedRentValue, receivedRentValue, status, createdDate, propertyId, propertyName, tenantId, tenantName, roomNo)

performance_notes.database_optimization: Uses NOLOCK hints for improved read performance
performance_notes.joins: Implements INNER JOIN with Properties and Tenants, LEFT JOIN with Rooms
performance_notes.search_enhancement: Extended search includes property names, tenant names, and room numbers

get_rent_track_count.description: Get count of rent tracks - Admin sees all rent tracks, Owner sees only their own rent tracks

response_body_success.data: number (count of rent tracks based on user role)

response_body_error.message: Access denied | Error getting rent track count

authorization.admin: Returns count of all rent tracks in the system
authorization.owner: Returns count of rent tracks associated with the logged-in owner

request_upload_url.description: Request a presigned URL for direct file upload to AWS S3 - supports Tenant/Owner profile pictures, documents, and Property images

data.uploadUrl: string (presigned S3 URL valid for 15 minutes)
allowedContentTypes: string array of allowed MIME types

response_body_error.message: Validation failed | Unauthorized | Access denied | Too many requests | Internal server error

confirm_upload.description: Confirm successful file upload to S3 and create FileMetadata record

request_body.s3Key: string (required - S3 key from request-upload response)

response_body_error.message: Invalid or expired upload token | File not found in storage | Unauthorized | Access denied
Upload token not found | Unauthorized to cancel this upload | Internal server error

get_entity_files.description: Get all files for a specific entity (tenant/owner/property)
get_entity_files.authorization: Bearer JWT token required - Admin sees all, Owners see their own entities only

get_file_by_id.description: Get file metadata by file ID
get_file_by_id.authorization: Bearer JWT token required - Admin sees all, Owners see their own files only

response_body_error.message: Access denied | File not found | Internal server error

get_latest_file.description: Get the latest file for an entity by category

response_body_error.message: Access denied | No files found for this entity and category | Internal server error

get_user_files.description: Get all files uploaded by a specific user - Admin only
get_user_files.authorization: Bearer JWT token required - Admin role only

response_body_error.message: Access denied (Admin only) | Internal server error

delete_file.description: Delete a file (soft delete in database, removes from S3)
delete_file.authorization: Bearer JWT token required - Admin or file owner only

response_body_error.message: Access denied | File not found | Internal server error

steps: 1. Frontend calls POST /files/request-upload with file details
2. Backend validates request and returns presigned S3 URL + upload token
3. Frontend uploads file directly to S3 using presigned URL
4. Frontend calls POST /files/confirm-upload with upload token and S3 key
5. Backend verifies S3 upload, creates FileMetadata record, returns CDN URL
6. Frontend can now use the CDN URL to display/access the file
security_features: Rate limiting: 5 uploads per minute per user
File type validation (images and documents only)

cdn_integration.description: Files are served via AWS CloudFront CDN for optimal performance

get_tenants_by_room.description: Get all tenants for a specific room

response_body_error.message: RoomId is required and must be greater than 0 | Error retrieving tenants for room | Access denied

notes: Owners can only see tenants from their own rooms
Only returns active tenants (IsActive = true)
roomId parameter is required and must be > 0

get_all_lookups.description: Get all lookup data in one call

RentTrackResponseDto.description: Enhanced rent track response with related entity data

properties.roomNo: string (nullable - room number from joined Room table)
properties.propertyName: string (property name from joined Property table)
properties.tenantName: string (tenant name from joined Tenant table)

enhancements.v1.1: Added roomNo, propertyName, and tenantName fields populated via database JOINs with NOLOCK optimization

RoomResponseDto.description: Room response with related entity data and tenant count

properties.propertyName: string (property name from joined Property table)
properties.ownerName: string (owner name from joined Owner table)
properties.currentTenantCount: number (count of active tenants in this room)

enhancements.v1.2: Added currentTenantCount field populated via separate tenant count query for accurate active tenant count

FileMetadataResponseDto.description: File metadata response with complete file information

properties.entityType: string (Tenant|Owner|Property|Room - the entity this file belongs to)
properties.cloudFrontUrl: string (CDN URL for accessing the file)
properties.uploadedAt: string (ISO date when file was uploaded)
properties.uploadedBy: number (user ID who uploaded the file)
properties.uploadedByName: string (nullable - name of user who uploaded the file)

enhancements.current: File management system with centralized FileMetadata table, AWS S3 storage, CloudFront CDN delivery, presigned URLs, rate limiting, and comprehensive audit trail

EntityFilesResponseDto.description: Response containing all files for a specific entity

properties.totalFileSize: number (total size of all files in bytes)

FileUploadUrlResponseDto.description: Response from file upload URL request containing presigned S3 URL

properties.uploadUrl: string (presigned S3 URL valid for 15 minutes)
allowedContentTypes: string array of allowed MIME types

FileUploadConfirmationDto.description: Response from successful file upload confirmation

notes: JSON uses camelCase naming.
Pagination is 1-based.
Search endpoints use pageNumber/pageSize; lookup endpoints use pageIndex/pageSize.
All monetary values are decimal type.
Standard response wrapper has status, message, data, errors unless otherwise noted.
Some endpoints are [AllowAnonymous] during development.
File Upload System: File management system using AWS S3 and CloudFront CDN:
- Files are managed through centralized FileMetadata table
- Supported entities: tenant, owner, property, room
- File categories: PropertyImage, TenantImage, RoomImage, OwnerImage, TenantDocument
- Three-step upload process: request presigned URL → upload to S3 → confirm upload
- Rate limiting: 5 uploads per minute per user
- File size limit: 10MB (configurable)
- Supported file types: Images (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .webp) and Documents (.pdf, .doc, .docx, .txt)
- JWT authentication required for all file operations
- Role-based access control: Admin sees all files, Owners see their own entities only
- Background cleanup service removes orphaned files hourly
- Files served via CloudFront CDN for optimal global performance
RentTrack API endpoints enhanced (v1.1): All RentTrack endpoints now return additional fields (propertyName, tenantName, roomNo) populated via optimized database JOINs with NOLOCK hints.
SearchRentTracks: Enhanced search functionality now includes property names, tenant names, and room numbers in search terms, with expanded sorting options.
Performance optimization: Database queries use NOLOCK hints for improved read performance.
- Update frontend to integrate with new file upload workflow
Entity-specific file usage examples:
- Tenant: ProfilePicture (photos), Document (Aadhar/PAN)
- Owner: ProfilePicture (photos), Document (Aadhar/PAN)
- Property: PropertyImage (exterior/interior), Document (agreements)
- Room: RoomImage (room photos), Document (inspection reports)
